title: Jack Black

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, rock out at a player's house, roleblocking them.
- Twice per game, you may instead use the Saxaboom, roleblocking your target's Non-Koopa neighbors
- At night, Challenge someone in the ring, dealing a powerful attack
- You may choose to trap another player in a book. This is mechanically similar to the jailor's jailing mechanic. You only have 1 kill with this, and once it's gone, you may not trap anyone in a book.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The first time you are attacked, you will use your mastery of kung-fu against your attacker.
- On Night 1, You will receive a random craftable item from Steve (3091). This can be used like any other ability.
- **Degreading Defense:**Every time your defense successfully blocks an attack, it drops by one level.
